Solve Dirichlet Parameters for Soft Changepoint Model

Source: R/sewer_smooth.R
changepoint_dirichlet_prior.Rd

This function solves for the parameters p_i of a Dirichlet distribution given a total sum alpha and number of parameters n.

Usage

changepoint_dirichlet_prior(
  alpha,
  n,
  min_break_dist = 1,
  prior_previous = NULL
)

Arguments

alpha

Total sum of all p_i

n

Number of parameters to solve for

min_break_dist

Minimum distance between changepoints. For first segment, can be left empty/set to 1.

prior_previous

Vector with alpha values of prior for previous segment. Required if prior_previous>1.

Value

A vector of p_i values
